item.title: How to Build a PC Guide
item.description: Introduction Back in 2014 when I was really into PC gaming, I ran a community website at Xydre.com. As part of the the effort to entice people to join, I wrote several guides trying to spread information on how to “get the most out of PC gaming”, including how to build your own gaming PC. The content of this post is a copy and paste of the original article I wrote from Xydre.
